author: bloritsch
msg: Add ability to print cascading exceptions.  This implementation does not require
Avalon Framework in the distributed jar--just the compile.  It tests the exception to
see if it is an instance of CascadingThrowable.  If not, everything acts as it has in
the past.  If so, then we recursively call the method until there are no more
